content.body: I think `Variable.wrap` ends up being a very different thing from delimited snapshots -- delimited snapshots operate on sections of the stack that contain (possibly) multiple variables, without the caller needing to know which variables are involved, whereas `Variable.wrap` is a convenience method for something you can already do without any kind of snapshots (global or delimited) as long as you know the variable(s) you want to operate on

content.body: Can you write example code of how delimited stacks would work?
